forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow and a slight chance of freezing drizzle before 11am. Mostly cloudy. High near 36, with temperatures falling to around 34 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 17, with temperatures rising to around 19 overnight. West wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 28. West northwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 18. West northwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Today
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely before 1pm, then a chance of snow and patchy blowing snow. Cloudy. High near 30, with temperatures falling to around 24 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow And Patchy Blowing Snow then Chance Snow Showers And Patchy Blowing Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow and patchy blowing snow before 7pm, then a chance of snow showers and patchy blowing snow between 7pm and 1am, then patchy blowing snow and a slight chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 11. Wind chill values as low as -6. West wind 20 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Snow Showers then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before 7am. Partly sunny, with a high near 19. Wind chill values as low as -5. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 5. West wind 0 to 10 mph.

High near 29, with temperatures falling to around 23 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 10 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 45 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. West wind 15 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 45 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 6, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Due to limited snowfall trails are unable to be groomed at this time.  When skiing the golf course trails please ski on designated marked trails only.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be closed 2/1 and 2/2.   Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Fast machine groomed. Good deep double tracked for classic. Red Toko worked better than my skins. Skating also was fast and easy.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: This morning’s  snow  was the icing on the cake over a well layered and constructed base . Beautiful groom - well done Nubs crew ! LF 7

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 6 lifts, Space Worm and the rope tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled and tracked on Monday morning, and are in great shape.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's a beautiful morning at Nub's with great snow. The wind is light this morning, but a strong breeze is forecast for the afternoon with some potential snow. The high temperature for the day should reach the upper 20's. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM with an hour break at 4:30 to prepare for the night session. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
